original_text: Traders from other nations keep away from you. A terrible thing has happened to you. It will be the end of you for ever.” ’ Traders from other nations keep away from you. korean_text: 많은 민족의 상인들이 다 너를 비웃음이여 네가 공포의 대상이 되고 네가 영원히 다시 있지 못하리라 하셨느니라

It will be the end of you for ever
